column4: Dr_Willis, since you just mentioned hard drives, is it possible to boot/install ubuntu with an external? I don't have xp anymore. Wiped it last night thinking everything would go smoothly, and now I'm stuck running livecd.
Is there a better way to go about it? I can't burn anything to disc since the only thing i can wrong without error is livecd.
Is there a number I can call to get customer service regarding ubuntu?
you'd have to pay for phone support, but the internet help is free
